name: Tall Regency Style Hat from Recycled Sari Silk
description:
Tall Regency style hat made from vintage sari silks.This one is 22" with a ruffled brim,built on a frame.The crown is 4".This hat is mauve,burgundy and pumpkin but custom colors and sizes are available.
Each is a one of a kind work of wearable art made from recycled fabric.

name: Basic black upcycled sheer dress with BoucleBodice and Sheer flounced Skirt
description:
Black Upcycled Dress with Boucle Top and Sheer Flounced Skirt SZ Large
A marriage of q stretchy boucle mini dress and a sheer nylon (i think) skirt.

The body of the dress is a stretch boucle texture and is STRETCHY.The actual measurements are
bust-39"
waist-36"
Hips -40"
From shoulder to hem is 48".


The tiered skirt is a sheer stretch and the whole body of the dress is lined with a vintage slip for modesty (blush).

This is an upcycled one of a kind dress.

name: Tiny Aqua Vintage Millinery Sinamay Bud Earrings
description:
Tiny Aqua Vintage Millinery Sinamay Bud Earrings
Aqua,blue green tiny bud earrings have been upcycled from vintage millinery trimming.These are sweet little sinamay (woven straw) buds with leaves.

The hat was 'Lily Strreet'  c1950 but was in unwearable condition and was covered with these little gems.

name: Recycled Slip Dress in Gray and Pewter Silk
description:
Upcycled silk dress in 2 warm gray fabrics with hand dyed vintage lace under the empire waist line.
The bodice is a stretch silk with adjustable straps.Because of the stretch there is no need for a closure just slips over your head.There is a grosgrain tie in the back.

This is a very forgiving style and will fit many sizes.The mannequin has a 36" bust and as you can see there is room.I have had this dress on a model who was larger and it fit her very well..

Even though it is silk it is hand washable!

Measurements taken flat;
bust 18 1/12 " with stretch
length 41" from shoulder to hem
(no waist needed)

This is a one of a kind upcycled dress.
This dress ships with insurance. 

make up artist -Jillian Carr 
model-Vanessa
Photos taken at Urban Miners LLC
(see "photo credit" page for links)

name: Black Chinstrap Hat / Esther Williams Style Vintage Style Swim Cap
description:
Black Chinstrap Hat / Esther Williams Style Vintage Style Swim Cap
All upcycled Aviatrix chinstrap retro swim cap is hand sewn from tee shirts,vintage fabrics,netting,sequins and feathers.The entire hat is sewn by hand with attention to detail.

CUSTOM?
What ever color your heart desires is available as I often hand paint and dye my own recycled fabrics.

Don't want feathers,or sequins?That is your call.Would you rather have beading?Done.I will w0rk with you to include all the elements you would like and make this your one of a kind creation.

This is wearable art.Please allow 2 week turn around time once all details are decided.It could be sooner.If you are in a hurry,Contact me and I will see what can be done.

I can also incorporate some fabrics or trinkets that you have.Contact me and we can discuss.

**This hat is being shown with http://ecoluxelondon.org at LONDON FASHION WEEK Sept 2011***

name: Spiral Rosette Recycled Cotton Headband on Elastic Band
description:
Spiral dyed tee shirt cotton rosettes have seed bead centers and are attached to fold over elastic headbands.The fold over elastic has a lovely silky look with lots of stretch.Each of these have 21" elastic.


This is an eco friendly fashion accessory.

name: Stacking Bangle Bracelets Made from Recycled Tee Shirts
description:
Stacking Bangle Bracelets Made from Recycled Tee Shirts,really.This is an aluminum 9" around and 1/4" wide covered in hand painted recycled tee shirt cotton.The whole bracelet is lacquered with a water based sealer and is impervious to anything.I wear mine in the shower.

This is a listing for one bracelet.To purchase more than one use the drop down menu and add 2.

name: Aqua Lace and Black Velvet Slip Dress/Upcycled
description:
Stretchy black velvet bodice with aqua lace skirt.The lace comes from a vintage slip and has a lovely flair.The bodice is a very stretchy black velvet that was once a skirt.Hand blanket stitching around arms and neckline.There is another portion of lace underneath also from a slip.
Hand washable.

Measurements taken flat
bust and waist 17" (fit 34-36 easily)
hips 19" ( fits 36-38" )
length from shoulder to hem 36"

I can make it shorter but not longer

This is a one of a kind upcycled dress.

name: Cocktail Hats Vintage 1950s Style
description:
Cocktail Hats Vintage 1950s Style 
A hand made buckram and wire frame is lightly padded and covered in hand painted silk chiffon.The wire is bendable and can be adjusted for the wearer.Although it stays on the head snap clips are added inside just to be sure.
A friend of mine saw something like it in a vintage movie and asked me to make one.She referred to it as a sort of "glorified headband". In fact it is a cocktail hat reminiscent of the hats of the late 1940 to early 1950s.
One size fits all and is a versatile style, it can be worn with short or long hair.

This style also makes a wonderful bridal headpiece and a veil can be attached to the back-custom work always welcome.

name: Ivory Silk Jersey Upcycled Slip Dress
description:
Ivory Silk Jersey Upcycled Slip Dress
This warm ivory silk jersey dress would make lovely eco friendly upcycled wedding dress.A distinctive roaring 20s flapper vibe but completely modern too.

The silk jersey has been lined throughout with a vintage nylon slip,vintage white rayon bias tape is ruched in vertical lines with ribbons left free.Ties across the back with an antique and hand dyed lace collar.

It is a beauty.If you have never encountered silk jersey,well,you don't know what you are missing.It is like spider webs!

Measurements taken flat
bust; 18" with plenty of "give"
hips: 19"
length; from the bottom of arm hole to hem is 33"

This is a one of a kind garment and ships with insurance.

Contact me with any questions.

name: Brown Raspberry and Aqua Cotton Cloche Hat Vintage style
description:
Brown and raspberry pink cotton cloche hat was refashioned from tee shirts and stretch velvet handmade flowers.The ribbon is a light teal grosgrain from a vintage c1950s cocktail hat.

Cotton cloche 1920s flapper cloche hat in brown,raspberry red and aqua recycled fabric.The base of the hat is recycled tee shirts.

A wired brim and ruched dark chocolate brown crown is topped with a lavender blue gray band of stretch velvet (which I hand dyed) fashioned into rosettes with a glass bead in the center.
Fits medium to large (22-23"). Completely lined in coordinating cotton.Hand wash.

Very comfortable to wear! Packs flat.

100% upcycled fabrics!

name: Pink Hand Painted Coolie Tilt Hat Recyced Wearable Art
description:
Vintage 1940s style pink hand painted "coolie"  tilt hat.A breezy little confection to perch on your noggin.Tie in a bow in the back or wrap the neck.All silk and hand painted by me. Edge trim is from a silk tie.Lined in Tiffany box blue silk.The hat is rigid bit not hard so it will not lose shape,there in wire on the perimeter.

One size fits all

.OOAK. wearable art

name: Mustard and Orange Plaid with Plaid Cloche Hat /Upcycled Wool
description:
Mustard and Orange Plaid with Plaid Cloche Hat /Upcycled Wool
Mustard upcycled wool cloche with green wool plaid band.Fits 22 1/2-23".the bottom can be turned up if you would like a less deep crown.

This would make a perfect winter hat,lined in tee shirt cotton for comfort.The black leaves are black and hand stitched in silver.

The "cherries" are hand felted wool balls with black leather lacing "stems".

name: Purple and Green Cotton Cloche Hat Vintage Style
description:
Cloche is made from recycled purple tee shirts that have been pieced together and hand stitched creating a tattered hat. Rosettes are made from tee shirts as well and are the same as the spiral bubble headbands.


There is a nylon "wire" in the brim to hold it's shape.The hat is hand washable and perfect for any season.

Will fit 22-23"

name: Persimmon Ombre Flounce Recycled Dress
description:
Persimmon Ombre Flounce Upcycled Dress
Persimmon upcycled flounce dress has am empire waist that is ruched with elastic.Fits a medium/large and is 36" long from shoulder to hem.

The model is 5'8".

The mannequin is 36" 29" 38".The top has a bit of lycra in it and the bottom is ombre in browns,persimmon and cream.Slips over the head without need of closure

This very comfortable dress is one of a kind
Hand washable

name: Red Plaid and Black Pleated Recycled Slip Dress
description:
This upcycled red and black slip dress has a flirty peplum and a long sheer 'perma' pleated black skirt.The mannequin shown measures 36" 29" 38" and is a medium.The dress has no closure and slips over the head.Length from shoulder to hem is 46". The model is 5'8".

Ties in the back for fit.

Custom orders for dresses are always welcome

make up artist -Jillian Carr
model-Vanessa
Photos taken at Urban Miners LLC

name: Black Silk Bell Flower Filigree Earrings
description:
Black Silk Bell Flower Filigree Earrings
Black flower dangle earrings made from silk and filigree metal cones.Very light weight and easy to wear with long kidney ear wires in antiqued black brass .

The silk has been stiffened and feels to the touch like paper but is impervious to everything!

name: Heart Necklace with Gold Flourish and a Single Tear
description:
Heart Necklace with Gold Flourish and a Single Tear
Each of these small hearts is a little treasure,a work of art to wear.They are hand painted and lacquered with18" black ball chain with closure.No 2 are exactly alike.

The painting is done on recycled tee shirt fabric and is lacquered with a water based sealer.I have shown a penny next to the heart for size comparison.A single "tear" is a vintage Japanese glass bead in all it's loveliness.

name: Fiber Jewelry Wide Handpainted Cuff Bracelet
description: An open backed adjustable cuff,hand painted recycled fabric over brass domed cuff 1 1/4" wide.All of the pieces have been painted,stiffened assembled and lacquered.This cuff feels like leather but is made from cotton and silk .Beads or chain kisses the top of your hand.Each is a work of wearable art and is discreetly signed by me.

name: Pink and Black Slip Dress Tattered and Care Worn/Upcycled
description:
This sassy pink and black party dress is made from a plethora of vintage items.A black slip is the base with a c1940s organdy full skirt and a drop waist woven from silk and cotton strips.Hours of hand sewing!

The slip itself is size 36 which is a S/M in today's sizes.
Measurements taken flat
bust; 36" with stretch,cup size about a b/c with give
waist; 29"
hips; 36" with stretch
length from shoulder ;40"
This is a one of a kind dress and ships insured

name: Sheer Blue Butterfly Headband
description: Sheer  Blue Butterfly Headband is attached to a hand painted skinny cotton covered headband.The sweet butterfly is a vintage applique c1960.

name: Royal Purple Velvet Large Flower Cocktail Hat
description:
Purple Cocktail Hat made from upcycled fabrics.This sculptural headpiece is a one size fits all due to the construction.I have built a wire frame that can be bent to suit.
The basic form is covered in a dark purple velvet.The large flowers are sculpted and hand painted by me from tee shirt fabric.It has been permanently stiffened and feels much like leather.It is impervious to weather..Small green flowers,beaded flower centers and a spray on coque feathers finish.

2 snap clips attached inside for a worry free fit.

A one of a kind wearable art hat for the woman who wants to be noticed.

name: Morning Glory Skinny Beaded Headband
description:
Refashioned tee shirts are hand painted and sculpted into this abstract interpretation of morning glories.These flowers are permanently stiffened and sealed and will stand up to anything-rain or shine!

The skinny headband is beaded with vintage cobalt blue beads.It is also very comfortable and suitable for those who don't like clips - or who aren't "hat people" (gasp).

*the beads here are very special.Glass beads of this vintage were lined with silver and have a patina that can't be described.They just don't look the same as modern beads(which are still pretty great).Made with real cobalt as well they have a gem-like quality.

name: Black and Blue and CopperHeadband with Metal Flowers and Feathers
description:
Black and Blue and CopperHeadband with Metal Flowers and Feathers
Black and blue feather headband/fascinator in silver metallic fabric made from a vintage silk and raw copper flower.The centers are beaded with abandon in black and blue glass beads.Feather plumes in black and blue are hand curled to encircle your head.The flower is securely attached to metal band covered in black satin.

One size,very light and easy to wear.

name: Midnight Blue Renaissance Cocktail Hat Upcycled by delightworthyn ART/wares
description:
Renaissance hat/headpiece is handmade from recycled and vintage materials.This hat has a buckram and wire clam shell base which was from a vintage hat.

I re fashioned to create the point in the center.It is covered and embellished with a recycled tee shirt cotton and lovely little vintage Japanese glass droplets frame the face.Self covered wide elastic holds the hat in place.

Wear it with an up do for a neo Victorian look or down for a modern look.Versatile and one size.

OOAK. Custom  available,use the contact link.

name: Black and Blue Patchwork Cloche Hat With Wm. Burroughs Text
description:
Black and Blue Patchwork Cloche Hat With Wm. Burroughs Text
This black cloche hat started as a Wm. Burroughs T shirt .Cut up pieced together with chartreuse zig-zag stitches.Lined fully in black and can be worn as the outside.2 for the price of one.
This hat has a wired brim and is a M/L.It will fit anyone except people with a really small head(you know who you are).It is hand washable and packs flat.

name: RegencyTall Hat in Dark Eggplant Purple
description:
Regency style  hat with deep crown and wired brim.

This is a hat built on a hand made frame of millinery wire and buckram. Made from recycled materials fits 22"-23" and is tall enough to be worn as a top hat but I would wear it lower to the brow(as per measurements). Lined in 100% cotton.Stitching is done in silk embroidery thread with a deep wine colored grosgrain wired brim.


*This hat was shown at London Fashion Week F/W 2011*


Any questions please feel free to convo me .

Although this hat is made from recycled materials it is an expensive piece. This is largely due to the time it takes to get recycled materials into useable shape,pulling apart etc. Secondly this hat is traditional millinery built entirely by me from the ground up. The hat is made almost exclusively by hand and as such is "couture" quality.

Custom listings require a non refundable good faith deposit.I am happy to work out a payment plan with you for the cost of this hat.

The possibilities are endless.Don't you just love that!

Shipping includes insurance.

name: White Feather Flapper Circlet
description:
White Feather Flapper Circlet
Large white feather flower with crystal center atop a pale pink rigid circlet covered in antique lace.A sweep of white ostrich across the forehead.Perfect for a bride.

22 1/2" around for this piece although custom orders are always available.

Hand built frame and lined in millinery grosgrain.

This circlet is a future heirloom and is constructed entirely by hand

Ships with insurance

name: Winter White Ewardian Tall Riding Hat with Trailing Scarf
description:
Edwardian riding hat style with long trailing silk scarf for the hat band.The hat is felted 100% wool in a winter white.I have appliqued antique lace detail on the front and underneath the brim.The lining is recycled vintage silk in blue and lavender.If I were getting married I would do it in winter,preferably with freshly fallen snow.This would be my wedding hat.23" around ,OOAK.

Do you want an Edwardian riding hat like this one but perhaps in another color?Custom orders are always welcome.Contact me and we can discuss.

Shipping cost reflects insurance +shipping

name: Bridal Circlet Wreath with Veil
description:
Pewter silk bridal wreath with veil is inspired by Edna St Vincent Millay's wedding.The story goes that after a nearly fatal illness she decided to marry her wealthy lover.Since it was a spur of the moment decision there were no bridal accouterments so a wreath was fashioned from wild flowers and her veil was mosquito netting.So, this is not exactly the same but an interpretation for a non-conventional bride.
The "wreath" is pewter silk organdy with silver stitching throughout and is encrusted with beads(no plastic).The veil is 30" long from the nape of the neck and has a finished edge.The veil has a blush of lilac to it.
I am happy to do something similar for you if these colors don't suit
Ships with insurance.

name: Morning Glory Tilted Neo Victorian Hat from Recycled Tee shirts.Sculptural wearable art for the head
description:
Morning Glory Tilted Neo Victorian Hat from Recycled Tee shirts.Sculptural wearable art for the head.
Tilted Victoriana Style hat was made from recycled tee shirts.The flower are hand painted with some plumage in blues and green.I built the hat with millinery wire and buckram and attached tee shirt snakes in a swirly pattern.The hat is the sealed with a water based sealer.Lined in cotton and trimmed with silk from a recycled necktie.This is a one size fits all and OOAK hat.

You can wear this with a steampunk ensemble or as a cocktail hat.It all depends on what you put it with-it is versatile.It is very light and has a cotton covered elastic band to hold it on your head.

name: Upcycled Lace Flapper Wedding Headpiece with Black Tattered Roses
description:
Flapper style wedding veil.Upcycled from a handmade cotton lace dresser scarf with a beautiful open work and flat rosette design.It is a lovely aged ivory color with black silk tattered roses on each side of the head and a spray of vintage c1960 applique in pale yellow and green.

This will fit 22" - 23".It can be made smaller but not larger.I am happy to discuss something custom "in the style of" with you for your wedding.
This is a one of a kind item.

name: Acid Green and Sapphire Blue Silk Wristlet Evening Bag
description:
Harlequin Reticule Wristlet is hand painted silks that have a bit of shimmer in sapphire blue and acid green.The lining is magenta silk and the bag closes with a drawstring with tassels on the ends.The handle is wire strung with glass beads in blues and green.When filled with your necessities the shape is a round pouch the you wear over your wrist around 7"

.Plenty of room for the most high maintenance of us.

name: Pale Pink Upcycled Silk Fairy Slip Dress
description:
Pale Pink Upcycled Silk Fairy Slip Dress
 is a slightly tattered long dress with pink crinkle silk skirt.Completely refashioned and very romantic.

This dress fits a larger bust well ,C to D cup ,and has a high waistline at 29"around.It zips up the back with elastic straps.On a 5'8" woman it hits the lower calf just above the ankle so if you are shorter it could be floor length.

This is a one of a kind wearable art dress.
Contact me with questions or for custom work.

make up artist -Jillian Carr
model-Kayla
Photos taken at Urban Miners LLC

*This dress is currently out being photographed for ALTERED COUTURE magazine.

name: Felted Wool Red  Clutch or Lime Green Messenger Bags
description:
Felted Wool Red or Green Handbags

Lime Green Shoulder Bag

Lime green wool felt messenger bag from Nepalese wool with a brown curlique design hand stitched on with wedgewood blue.Chocolate Lollipop lining and a vintage shell button closure.Messenger bag style measuring 9x12 with a bottom gusset,inside pocket for phone or whatever.Strap is 32" long. 

Red Plaid Clutch

Felted Nepali wool clutch with plaid cotton lining.It measures 7"x9" and a fold over design which doesn't require a closure.The vintage leather flower button is just for show..

name: Purple Patchwork Tattered Cotton Empire Waist Dress RECYCLED
description:
Tattered cotton dress is fully upcycled from recycled tee shirts in pink,purple and red. The bodice is a woven technique with a lot of hand stitching. Empire waist .Open and ties in the back.

Washable

size small
Measurements
bust 32" ties in back give some flexibility
hips 38"
length from shoulder to hem 36"

name: Spike Spider Mum Brooch/Pin Sculptured Recycled Cotton
description:
Spike Spider Mum Brooch/Pin Sculptured Recycled Cotton
Large whimsical spider mum made from tee shirt fabric that has been stiffened and then lacquered and attached to a pin back.Each is 3-4 inches in size.

This process creates a fabric that feels much like leather.It will stand up to anything.

name: Black and White Stripe Cotton Shrug RECYCLED
description:
Black and white horizontal stripe shrug with ruffle bottom and lacing at wrists.This is a size large.Made by me from recycled cotton (tee shirt) garments.

Machine washable.

Perfect to wear over a dress or a tank.

Measurements:
Bust - 39"
sleeves - 18" from shoulder to sleeve bottom.The shoulders are slightly lower than the natural shoulder.

This is a one of a kind handmade item.

name: Blood Red Sculpted Flower Headband Wearable Art
description:
Blood red headband/fascinator is constructed out of recycled materials.The flowers are hand painted and have been stiffened and some vintage lace with silk millinery leaves.
I attached it to a skinny metal headband that is satin covered.

This is a sculptural piece.The flowers have been stiffened and will not droop even in the rain (not that I recommend this)

One size.

Custom orders are welcome if you are looking for certain color

name: Antique Velvet and Raw Copper Flower Neo Victorian Tilt Hat
description:
Antique Velvet and Raw Copper Flower Neo Victorian Tilt Hat-
This copper steampunk tilt hat is a true piece of millinery,all fashioned from recycled and by-product scraps.The hand crafted fascinator base is covered in dusty eggplant velvet and antique.Attached to the hat are vintage raw copper flowers and ostrich and peacock feathers.A small length of dark brass chain dips seductively over the eye.


There is elastic to hold this hat on and if requested I can add some loops as well.Please put this request in notes to seller.

name: Cuff Bracelet Fiber Jewelry with Open Back one size
description: Cuff bracelets made from recycled tee shirts.Each cuff is 1/2'' wide with an open back for adjustment.Under the lacquered fabric is an aluminum form that can be bent.This process makes fabric look much like leather.It is impervious to anything.You can even wear it in the shower!

name: Stripe and Chiffon Upcycled Dress
description:
Stripe and Chiffon Upcycled Dress
Upcycled dress has a stretch stripe top and a double layer silk chiffon skirted bottom.The dress has snap closures along the back and fits M/L due to the stretch.The waist has many ,many hand stitched vintage laces and applique.
Stripe and Chiffon Upcycled Dress

The style is reminiscent of 1910/20 bathing costumes.

100% upcycled dress is one of a kind.

My mannequin measures 36" 29" 38".The model in the picture is smaller.Versatile .

Contact me with any questions.

Ships with (included) insurance.

name: 1920s Vintage Style Bandeau Wide Headband
description:
1910-1920s style headband in a bandeau headpiece in deep wine red .These were commonly called 'headache bands' during their heyday.The silk flowers and beads are attached to a wide red stretch lace headband.

Each piece is one of a kind and handmade by me alone.

The flowers are 100% silk from recycled garments that have been hand dyed.

One size fits all.This items is NOT intended for children.

name: Silk Flower Fascinator with Velvet Leaves
description:
Floral hat with birdcage veil-A small silk reinforced pancake lavishly adorned with handmade flowers needle sculpted and hand dyed from silk.The silks are recycled from previous garments.The veiling is a vintage French silk in coffee color.The strap to hold this hat on is in a lovely petal pink satiny elastic.
Silk Flower Fascinator with Velvet Leaves
I am listing this hat as both made to order and one of a kind because I will make a custom one for you,in the colors you would like.I will work closely with you to match whatever colors you are using for your wedding.

Or you can purchase this one.

This hat is on sale was $125,now $85!

Custom one is $125.

name: Orange and Wedgewood Blue Silk Velvet Brim Hat Vintage fabrics
description:
Orange and Wedgewwod Blue Vintage Velvet Brim Hat / Upcycled silk velvet c1920
I adore the hats worn by women just before and during WW1.Not quite the exuberant Victorian and also not the close to the head flapper cloche (both of which I am also fond) there is something about the way they frame a woman's face and are very practical to wear.This hat falls squarely in that category!

The particulars- the tangerine orange and Wedgewood blue velvets are both from vintage garments c1920 and are lovely silk velvet.So luxe.The black velvet is from an upcycled skirt that I washed to give it an aged look.It is trimmed around the edge in vintage rayon ruffly trim .The focal flower is made from the same rayon in a dark rust color with a sparkly crystal faceted bead in the center.There is a biot feather spray in black.(if you would like some more plumage add that request in notes to seller and I will oblige)

This hat fits a head size up to 22" - 22 1/2" .Measure your head above the eyebrows and around including your hair to get hat size).The brim is 2 1/2" wide and is wired so you can bend to suit.Completely lined in black tee shirt cotton for comfort.

name: Tattered Blue Flapper Slip Dress in Vintage Silk and Velvet
description:
Tattered Blue Flapper Slip Dress in Vintage Silk and Velvet
Blue silk and velvet flapper dress has lace hand stitched detailing using vintage and antique laces as well as metallic fabric from the 1920s.
The top is a stretch velvet and will fit 36 inch bust and a 28-29" waist.The skirt is an a-line and flattering.On a 5' 6" frame it reaches mid calf.It is silk from a c1940 dress.

This is a 100% upcycled piece and is one of a kind.It will ship with insurance (included)

name: Ivory Silk Wedding Bonnet with Gold Trim
description:
Ivory Silk Wedding Bonnet with Gold Trim
Silk charmeuse in a vanilla cream color.The gold/cream band around the face is fashioned from a vintage obi.The veil has finished edges and is 30" long and detachable.
The silk lining is also vintage and a very pale lilac.It will fit anyone but only worn by a unique individual.This hat would also look fabulous with a simple bias cut art deco inspired gown.Do you want to cause a sensation?

Insurance is included in shipping price.

name: Upcycled Flapper Slip Dress in Black and Pewter Silk
description:
Upcycled silk vintage style flapper dress in black and pewter. The bodice is stretch silk with an over dress of black and white print chiffon elasticized at the knee to mimic a hobble skirt of the 1910-1920 era(Downton Abbey)The bottom is metallic pewter and is polyester .

The bodice is a stretch silk with adjustable straps ruched with elastic under the bust with a center vintage beaded applique.The hems are rolled and hand stitched with contrasting thread.Because of the stretch there is no need for a closure just slips over your head.

Even though it is silk it is hand washable!

Measurements of my mannequin are 36" 29" 38"
the cup size will fit A or B with stretch and is small silk lycra with the length 43" from shoulder to hem

This is a one of a kind upcycled dress.

This dress ships with insurance.

name: Tulle Poof Headband With Sequins
description:
Tulle Poof Headband With Sequins
Thin Alice band headband covered in gold knit fabric with a flourish of white tulle springing from a beaded and sequined focal fabric trim piece.It is a rich cobalt gold and dark green much like peacock feathers.
One size.

name: Mini Tilt Ivory Pillbox Hat with Pearls
description:
Mini Tilt Pillbox Hat in Ivory with Pearls Eco Wedding
White silk mini pillbox hat perfect for a bride.Handmade flower with glass pearl encrusted center with cream rayon millinery ribbon and birdcage veiling as texture. One size with white hat elastic.

The elastic goes behind the head and is hidden by the hair.


Perfect accessory to put the finishing touch on your more formal attire.

name: Lacquered Vintage Lace Flower Necklace
description:
Lacquered Vintage Lace Flower Necklace
Vintage lace flowers are carefully plucked from a larger piece of handmade lace.Hand dyed and treated to become rigid and impervious to moisture.

There are a nice aged and mossy green with raspberry and
yellow , all very subtle and antique looking.Perfect for lovers of vintage or steampunk.

Each lace flower is on an 18" black ball chain with clasp.

name: Orange Heart Shaped Pillbox Hat with Red Birdcage Veil
description:
Orange Heart Shaped Pillbox Hat with Red Birdcage Veil 
Heart Shaped pillbox hat in tangerine silk velvet.A fun little hat with a sense of humor,while making it I couldn't help noticing that it looked like a candy conversation heart.I just had to embroider a message on it-BE MINE.

The velvet is from a c1920 evening coat,the birdcage veil is red and there are 2 rosettes on the back in fuchsia with black beaded centers.

Hat elastic is the  fastener which is very thin and goes behind the head and is covered by the hair.

Make a statement without saying a word!

name: Circlet with Vintage Copper Leaves and Faceted Jewels
description:
Black circlet is made from vintage raw copper flowers and acorns with faceted black glass beads on cotton covered handmade wreath form.This one is 221/2"-23".This is a one of a kind item due to the availability of the elements.If you would like something similar in a different size I may be able to accommodate.My own supplies are getting low and prices for the raw metal is rising-rapidly and availability is tight.These are vintage metal elements with all the lovely patina intact.

The back of the focal element is covered with recycled black tee shirt fabric for comfort.You can wear it back on you head more like a headband or lower more like a tiara or wreath.


Perfect for a faerie or Renaissance themed event or wedding.Veiling can be added-contact me for pricing/details.

name: Recycled Cotton and Wool Dreadlock Headband or Hat
description:
Cotton and Wool Dread Hat Headband /Recycled Tee Shirts and Felted Wool in black and blue.
Quite a few tee shirts gave their lives for this hat.It is a pull on,one size fits most kind of hat.Made of tee shirt cotton pulled,stretched and woven and added felted wool dreads in black

Hand wash.

name: Flapper Bandeau Headband with Beads and Sequins
description:
1920s flapper style 'headache' band.These wide over the brow headbands were called headache bands in the roaring 20s.The are also known as bandeau.The focal flowers are lovely sequin and seed bead blossoms.Drippy beaded fringe in coppery brown finished this lush piece.Silk covered elastic means that it is an easy fit.It measures 22 1/2" so it is not too tight to avoid 'hair bunching' in the back.

Recycled materials.

Contact me for custom.

name: Lotus Pod Textile Fiber Earrings with Vintage Bead Teardrop
description:
Lotus Pod fiber art earrings.Shiny and complex handmade earrings made from tee shirt cotton.I have developed a technique that makes the fabric rigid and impervious to anything.They are then sealed with a high gloss varnish.The dangle glass bead is vintage Japanese and is a true teardrop.

These are very light weight and easy to wear.

Dark brass ear wires .
One of a kind.

name: Multi color Fringe Shoulder Tunic Dress RECYCLED
description:
Black and brown loose tunic style dress with multi color fringe shoulder 'epaulettes' This is made entirely from recycled tee shirts ! An easy to wear cotton dress that is loose but not overly so.
Machine washable and will fit just about anyone.

measurements;
bust 39"
hips 41"
length from shoulder to hem 36"

This is a one of a kind garment but I can design something like it for you.Contact me through link on home page.

name: Felted Cranberry Red Cloche Hat with Zipper Detail
description:
Cranberry red Wool/rayon outside in a flattering handmade cloche (toque) hat with a deconstructed zipper for trim.
The covered button was made from an old tie.Fully lined in the most fabulous Tiffany box blue silk.

23/12" around to fit almost anyone.

name: Brown Velvet Choker or Bandeau Headband with Verdigris Filigree
description:
Brown velvet choker in dark brown velvet with silver stitching and edged with lush trim and centered with verdigris brass filigree.A glass bead catches the light.
Lined with black silk and ties in the back with long hand painted silk sash in muted blue and greens.Can be worn as a choker around the neck, or as a headband.Could also be worn as a sash.

It is 72" long and 1 1/2" wide.

name: Black and White Striped Floppy Hat Recycled Cotton Tee Shirts
description:
Black cotton and appliqued vintage lace on an elasticized shirred crown make this a one size fits all hat .The trim is black and white strip which is NOT wired for a floppy boho look.

Made from all recycled tee shirts and vintage lace this hat packs flat and is hand washable.

The secret is in the shirred elastic so this hat is one size.

name: Recycled Cotton Regency Style Tall Hat
description:
Regency tall hat made from tee shirts hand painted and one of a kind.This hat was shown at London Fashion Week but is now back and ready for some lucky person to wear!.Made from hand painted and sewn recycled T shirts.Rich fruity colors this hat has a wired brim and a lot of subtle detail.Funky wired curlicue focal feature.You can bend to suit.

Hat is 23" about with a 4" deep crown to be worn lower on the head.It has some give and therefore flexible.The brim is 2 1/2" at the widest point(front)and tapers to 1 1/2"(back).Fully lined in T shirt cotton.

Hand washable.

name: Pumpkin and Teal Upcycled Silk Drop Waist Flapper Dress
description:
Pumpkin orange and dark teal sleeveless dress has a drop waist with a 1920s flapper style.The bodice is hand stitched using recycled sari silk and vintage silk scarves.

It has a care worn tattered style that is flirty and feminine.

Fully lined in a vintage nylon slip.

A one of a kind wearable art dress.I can make a custom dress for you.Please use the contact link and I will  email you and we can discuss.

Measurements for this dress
Bust 30"
Hips 36"
Length from shoulder to hem 37"
Contact me if you need further measurement info.I am always available for questions/comments.

name: Hand Painted Victorian Style Recycled Cotton Bonnet
description:
Cotton  Neo Victorian bonnet is hand painted pieced together recycled tee shirts lined in black.(reversible) Ties under the chin.Perfect ladies Steampunk item .One of a kind and made by me alone.

Slouchy caps are fine but a bonnet is better.

This hat will fit anyone.

name: Vintage Leaf and Felted Berries Woodland Fairy Headbands
description:
Vintage velvet millinery leaves from Japan attached to a skinny covered 'alice' band.A few felted wool balls for centers and some ribbon.

Dance with the nymphs or wear it as 
the sweetest headband to brighten up your holiday party.

Each one is unique,one of a kind,item.

I can work with you to make custom headbands for an event.These would be perfect for a wedding party.Contact me for quotes.

name: Tattered Patchwork Reticule Drawstring Pouch
description:
Pieced and slightly tattered ivory drawstring reticule is upcycled from small strips of silks,linen and lace.The perfect little bag to fit your necessities whilst still maintaining a vintage-y look.

The lace applique is antique,much of it hand made, and has been subtly dyed  giving it an aged time worn look.Measuring 8 1/2" x7" this bag has the right amount of space with a silk drawstring closure. Lined in  silk.

Custom orders can be done if you are looking for certain colors.Or another size.Please be aware that there is a small non refundable good faith deposit required before I start work.Feel free to contact me with any questions.

name: Vintage Lace Fabric Tiara
description:
Vintage lace tiara from a small piece of vintage fancy work.It is cotton cutwork that  has been backed in a stiffened silk chiffon.The glass pearl drop is vintage from Japan.It is on a skinny cotton wrapped tiara headband.
One size and one of a kind.
It is a lovely creamy white and has a little shabby chicness to it.
Contact me for custom work-I have quite a bit of vintage laces.

name: Renaissance Bridal Headpiece with Silk Gauze Veil
description:
Renaissance bridal headpiece is made with vintage materials.The crown is a cut work lace cotton in a winter white.There is a little oxidation of the fabric which adds to the charm.Under the white is a teal colored silk and it is lined with Belgian unbleached linen.A study in texture.There is a small amount of dark teal velvet which off sets the hand painted and beaded silk flower.This flower is removable.

The veil is new fabric in a non traditional choice of silk gauze.it is very light and floaty in a rectangle shape 30"x22" with a hand rolled hem and beaded corners for weight.A few silver beads across the forehead.I can easily customize a veil-longer ,no beads,etc.

The crown is 3" tall and 23" around.It is open on the top .

Custom work is always welcome.

name: Recycled Tee Shirt Cotton Cloche Hat
description:
Cotton cloche made from recycled tee shirt cotton.A nylon "wire" brim keeps the slight flare on the base intact for hand washing.The tattered flower is vintage silk with a button center.It is removable on a pin.

Packs flat.Hand washable.Ecofashion. 

One size.

name: Blue Tattered Cloche Hat with vintage silk butterfly applique
description:
Felted Wool cloche hat in shades of blue/purple.Vintage silk scarf butterflies are hand appliqued all around with a slightly tattered shabby look.The brim is wired.
Petersham millinery belting (sweatband) inside.This hat is 22 1/2 ".

A perfect winter hat for the dreary days of darkness.





My mannequin head measures 23"

name: Upcycle Yellow and Gray Dress
description:
This upcycled yellow and gray dress has a steampunk style reminiscent of 1890 dance hall. The mannequin shown measures 36" 29" 38".This is a slightly tattered design in silk with a stretch back and can accommodate a larger bust measurement.

This is a one of a kind dress.Custom orders are welcome.

Contact me with any questions.

*this dress is currently unavailable.It is out being photographed for ALTERED COUTURE magazine and will be available soon*


make up artist -Jillian Carr 
model-Kayla
Photos taken at Urban Miners LLC

name: Pink and Orange Circus Stripe Recycled Tee Shirt Dress
description:
Circus stripe dress is fully upcycled from recycled tee shirts.The smocking is done with elastic thread and is very forgiving.The waist is also elastic.

Washable

size medium / large

name: Vintage Lace Bandeau Headband in Ecru and Green
description:
Vintage lace headband bandeau captures the days of The Great Gatsby in a lovely ecru color is backed with sage green cotton from a recycled tee shirt.There is some interfacing sandwiched between for body.Several vintage crystals are sewn on,they are a pale amethyst in color.This attached to 48" of wide millinery grade grosgrain and can also be worn around the waist.You could also tie under the chin in a bonnet like fashion.Versatile!

Millinery grosgrain is not the same as the ribbon you are likely to find at your local fabric store.The fiber content is rayon/cotton blend is less slippery and drapes well.It has a quality feel.

This style would make the basis for a wonderful custom wedding headpiece.I am happy to kick some ideas around with you for your day including attendant pieces to coordinate.

name: Chocolate Brown Crushed Velvet Fez
description:
Brown crushed velvet Fez Hat for men or women upcycled fabric with hand dyed silk cord detail.
It is really quite understated and lush.

Size- The fez is slightly smaller at the top of crown at 20" the base ( which fits around the head) is 23".
The height is 5".

Fully cotton lined.

This can be made as a custom item.
